<S%H369>"There<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> <S%H6918>holy<s%> like the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3588>Indeed,<s%> <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> <S%H1115>besides<s%> Thee, <S%H369>Nor<s%> is <S%H369>there<s%> any <S%H6697>rock<s%> like our <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H1696>"Boast<s%> <S%H7235><s%> <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H7235>more<s%> so <S%H1364>very<s%> <S%H1364>proudly,<s%> Do not let <S%H6277>arrogance<s%> <S%H3318>come<s%> out of your <S%H6310>mouth;<s%> For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is a <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H1844>knowledge,<s%> And with Him <S%H5949>actions<s%> are <S%H8505>weighed.<s%>
